title: AI Learning Your Patterns at Home
description: A 60-second lesson on AI Learning Your Patterns at Home.

discovery.text: Over time it predicts: Sundays you sleep in, Wednesdays you leave early, rainy days you linger at home longer.

punchline.text: Your home learns you before you learn it.
